sourcesContent:
Orders List

  • Order ID: {{ order.orderId }}

    User Name: {{ order.name }}

    Email: {{ order.email }}

    Contact Number: {{ order.contact }}

    Amount: {{ order.amount | currency: 'INR':'symbol-narrow' }}

    Mode of Payment: {{ order.paymentMethod }}

    Payment ID: {{ order.paymentId }}

    Delivery Address:

    {{ order.address }}

    {{ order.city }}, {{ order.state }}, {{ order.zip }}

    Order Date: {{ order.orderDate | date: 'dd-MMM-YYYY' }}
